Information management system for SVCE Co-curricular activities

I did this project for Dr.SusanElias , Dean of Co-Curricular activities , SVCE , during my final year at college. Managing information about co-curricular activities inside my college was very paperish , so she decided to make a web portal where each and every event that happens inside the college gets logged into database .
Almost all details about the event gets logged , the form has 15+ fields .
Some of the highlights in this project are AutoSave,ImagePreview before upload , CRUD for all information entered.
  •

Made using

PHP .HTML .CSS .Javascript .Apache .Jquery .Jquery UI
  • Faculty side Data-entry page
  • It has a total of about 15 different fields
  • Because of this , we had to create features like EDIT and AUTO SAVE
  • The drafts and edit page
  • Faculty can see the status of their posts.They can edit their posts as well
  • They can also grab a PDF of their post
  • Upload of images is available
  • Preview of image being Uploaded
  • Faculty can add a description to the images they add
  • CRUD for the images
  • Home page of curricular activties , SVCE .The co curricular events that are posted by the Faculties
  • Shows three recent events per category
  • Detailed view of the co curricular events that are posted by the Faculties
  • a slider , inside the detailed view page containing the images and their description as posted by the faculty
